body_html:
Okay.

I followed your instructions.
Then later on i run into an issue. something to do with

arm-linux-androideabi-gcc: error trying to exec 'cc1': execvp: No such file...

Then i googled a bit. and found a solution here...

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10207280/error-compiling-android-on-ubuntu-11-10

In short, i did not extract my ndk with the right tool. so i did not have executable permissions .

So i re-did the extraction using unzip.

Voila! Problems solved with permissions.

SUCCESSFUL BUILD ACCOMPLISHED!

Hope you don't mind if i close this issue.

Thanks very much Andrew. God bless.

body:
Okay.

I followed your instructions.
Then later on i run into an issue. something to do with 

arm-linux-androideabi-gcc: error trying to exec 'cc1': execvp: No such file...

Then i googled a bit. and found a solution here...

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10207280/error-compiling-android-on-ubuntu-11-10

In short, i did not extract my ndk with the right tool. so i did not have executable permissions .

So i re-did the extraction using unzip.

Voila! Problems solved with permissions.

SUCCESSFUL BUILD ACCOMPLISHED!

Hope you don't mind if i close this issue.

Thanks very much Andrew. God bless.
